GameConditionDef.label: blessing of the Wind
GameConditionDef.description: Your ritual brought the blessing of the wind.
GameConditionDef.letterText: The gentle gust is sweeping away and reduced the duration of toxic particles and the heat wave.\n\nIt should pass in about a day.

GameConditionDef.label: blessing of the Sun
GameConditionDef.description: Your ritual brought the blessing of the Sun.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The Sun is returning to normal.
GameConditionDef.letterText: The Sun has gained its brilliance, reducing the duration of coldsnap and volcanic winter, and ending the eclipse and rain.\n\nIt should pass in about a day.
